Hi, I'm Ravit

Passionate about the intersection of products and businesses with data science and functional design. I’m currently working with the Platforms Data Science group at Uber in San Francisco.

On the side I love researching urban policy in the developing world, playing the piano, and fiddling with Abelton Live.

I semi regularly blog about ideas interesting to me over at Shallow Learnings
